trans-unit.source: Container for all extended editor logic for properties.
trans-unit.target: Contenitore di tutta la logica editor esteso per le proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedPropertyValueEditor class can hold two <xref:System.DataTemplate> objects, one for an inline editor and one for an extended editor.
trans-unit.target: La classe ExtendedPropertyValueEditor può contenere due <xref:System.DataTemplate>oggetti, uno per un editor inline e uno per un editor esteso.</xref:System.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The inline editor provides a custom interface that appears within the bounds of the `Properties` window, and the extended editor provides an interface that appears in a new window.
trans-unit.target: L'editor inline fornisce un'interfaccia personalizzata che viene visualizzata entro i limiti del `Properties` finestra e l'editor esteso fornisce un'interfaccia che viene visualizzato in una nuova finestra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the visual interface for the inline editor, and the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the extended editor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A>proprietà restituisce il modello XAML per l'interfaccia visiva per editor inline e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A>proprietà restituisce il modello XAML per l'editor esteso.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: These are typically provided in a ResourceDictionary elsewhere in the project.
trans-unit.target: In genere forniti in un oggetto ResourceDictionary altrove nel progetto.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> to invoke your custom ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile utilizzare il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>per richiamare il ExtendedPropertyValueEditor personalizzato.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"></xref> class without specified extended and inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"> </xref> classe senza specificato estesa editor inline e <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"></xref> with the specified extended and inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"> </xref> con l'oggetto esteso editor inline e <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: When used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza, il relativo <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A>è impostato su un <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> utilizzato per l'esteso popup / bloccato editor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the inline editor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> utilizzato per l'editor inline.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> utilizzato per l'esteso popup / bloccato editor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> object used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per l'editor popup o bloccato esteso.
